question: What was the theme of the eleventh five-year plan?
option2: Towards faster and more inclusive growth
answer: Towards faster and more inclusive growth
explanation: The theme of the approach paper of the eleventh five year plan has been ‘towards faster and more inclusive growth’. The eleventh five year plan was operational during the time period of 2007-2012. It gave main thrust on social sector, agriculture and rural development. It aims to reduce the level of poverty.
